column2: title=Sotheby's The Library of Richard Manney 11 October 1991
image=[[File:Sotheby's The Library of Richard Manney 11 October 1991.jpg

column1: '''''Sotheby's The Library of Richard Manney 11 October 1991''''' is an auction catalogue from [[Sotheby's]]. Lot 298 was a first edition of ''[[The Fellowship of the Ring]]'' with an inscription in [[tengwar]] by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].<ref group=note>Identified by [[Forodrim
column2: Mellonath Daeron]] as DTS 46 (Mellonath Daeron Index of Tengwa Specimina), "The Manney Dedication".</ref> The inscription is reprinted and discussed by [[Carl F. Hostetter]] in [[Vinyar Tengwar 21
column3: ''Vinyar Tengwar'' No.21]] and by [[Nancy Martsch]] in issue [[Vinyar Tengwar 22
column13: articlename=The Mellonath Daeron Index of Tengwa Specimina (DTS)
